thread.title: Upcoming Travel Summit and Exhibition in October
thread.title_full: Upcoming Travel Summit and Exhibition in October

author: Assignment Editor
title: Upcoming Travel Summit and Exhibition in October
text:
Upcoming Travel Summit and Exhibition in October Original,   
Sep 10, 2015 eTN   
From 19-21 October 2015, the Halal Travel Summit and Exhibition will take place in Abu Dhabi. Visitors from over 40 countries have already registered to the event by the Abu Dhabi Tourism and Culture Authority. 
Visitors have the chance to network with important representatives from travel and tourism industries and attend a seminar programme packed with Halal Tourism offers and knowledge. The 3-day exhibition and summit is free of charge.
